Name: Slack - Notify Deployment
Description: Notifies Slack of deployment status. Uses the Octopus Deploy system variable to determine whether a deployment was successful.

Parameters.Name: HookUrl
Parameters.Label: Webhook URL
Parameters.HelpText: The Webhook URL provided by Slack, including token.

Parameters.Name: Channel
Parameters.Label: Channel
Parameters.HelpText: Which Slack channel to post notifications to.

Parameters.Name: IconUrl
Parameters.Label: Icon URL
Parameters.HelpText: The icon to use for this user in Slack

Parameters.Name: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username shown in Slack against these notifications

Parameters.Name: DeploySuccessful
Parameters.Label: Deploy Successful
Parameters.HelpText: This flag controls whether to post a success or failure message.
